clubs.name: Computer Programming Club
clubs.description: The Programming Club welcomes students of all experience levels, from beginners to advanced coders. We focus on learning problem-solving techniques and collaborating to help each other succeed in our studies and future career achievements.

clubs.name: Digital Arts Club
clubs.description: The Digital Arts Club focuses on graphic design, animation, and digital storytelling for artistic development.

clubs.name: Women In Stem Club
clubs.description: The Women In STEM Club provides support and networking opportunities for women pursuing careers in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

clubs.name: Robotics Club
clubs.description: The Robotics Club builds robots, competes in contests, and collaborates on engineering projects.

clubs.name: Gym
clubs.description: The Gym club promotes fitness and healthy living with various exercise programs and activities for students.
